name: TeslaPhone II
shortDescription: A cutting-edge smartphone with a powerful camera.
detailsDescription: Experience the future with Smartphone X, featuring a stunning AMOLED display, a triple-lens camera system, and a long-lasting battery. Perfect for capturing life's moments.

name: Wireless Headphones Pro
shortDescription: Immersive sound and active noise cancellation.
detailsDescription: Dive into your music with Wireless Headphones Pro. Enjoy crystal-clear audio and block out the world with advanced noise-cancellation technology. Comes with a comfortable, ergonomic design.

name: Ultra 4K OLED TV
shortDescription: A stunning visual experience with perfect blacks.
detailsDescription: The Ultra 4K OLED TV brings cinema-quality visuals to your home. With pixel-perfect black levels and vibrant colors, every scene comes to life. Features a sleek, bezel-less design.

name: Smart Watch Sport
shortDescription: Track your fitness and stay connected on the go.
detailsDescription: The Smart Watch Sport is your ultimate fitness companion. Monitor your heart rate, track your workouts, and get notifications directly on your wrist. Durable and water-resistant.

name: Compact Digital Camera
shortDescription: Capture high-quality photos with ease.
detailsDescription: This compact digital camera is perfect for both amateurs and professionals. With its high-resolution sensor and intuitive controls, you can capture stunning photos and videos in any setting.

name: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
shortDescription: Tiny earbuds with powerful sound and ANC.
detailsDescription: These earbuds deliver a premium audio experience in a compact form. Featuring active noise cancellation and a secure, comfortable fit, they are perfect for daily commutes and workouts.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
shortDescription: Loud, clear sound in a portable design.
detailsDescription: Take your music anywhere with this powerful and portable Bluetooth speaker. Its rugged design and long battery life make it ideal for outdoor adventures. Connects wirelessly to any device.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
shortDescription: Effortless cleaning with smart navigation.
detailsDescription: Let the Robot Vacuum Cleaner do the work for you. With smart mapping technology and powerful suction, it cleans your home efficiently, even in hard-to-reach areas. Control it with your smartphone.

name: Smart Home Hub
shortDescription: Control all your smart devices from one place.
detailsDescription: The Smart Home Hub is the central brain of your connected home. It seamlessly integrates with a wide range of devices, allowing you to manage lighting, security, and more with simple voice commands or through the app.

name: Portable Power Bank
shortDescription: Never run out of power on the go.
detailsDescription: The Portable Power Bank provides a reliable charge for your devices wherever you are. Its high-capacity battery and fast-charging ports ensure you stay connected all day.

name: Gaming Keyboard RGB
shortDescription: Mechanical keys and customizable RGB lighting.
detailsDescription: Designed for gamers, this keyboard offers a tactile and responsive feel. The customizable RGB lighting and anti-ghosting technology give you a competitive edge. Built with durable materials for long-term use.

name: Wireless Mouse Ergonomic
shortDescription: Comfortable and precise for long hours of work.
detailsDescription: The Wireless Mouse Ergonomic is designed for comfort. Its shape reduces wrist strain, and its high-precision sensor ensures smooth and accurate tracking. Perfect for both office and creative tasks.

name: Laptop Stand Adjustable
shortDescription: Improve your posture and cooling with this stand.
detailsDescription: This adjustable laptop stand helps you work more comfortably by raising your screen to eye level. It also improves air circulation, preventing your laptop from overheating during long work sessions.

name: External SSD 1TB
shortDescription: Blazing-fast storage in a pocket-sized drive.
detailsDescription: Store and transfer large files in seconds with this high-speed external SSD. Its compact and durable design makes it easy to carry with you, while the 1TB capacity provides ample space for all your data.

name: Gaming Monitor 27''
shortDescription: 165Hz refresh rate with 1.5k oled panel.
detailsDescription: The 27'' Gaming Monitor delivers an incredibly smooth and responsive gaming experience. With a high refresh rate and fast response time, it reduces motion blur and ghosting for a clearer picture.

name: Smart Air Purifier
shortDescription: Breathe cleaner air with a smart purifier.
detailsDescription: The Smart Air Purifier removes allergens, pollutants, and dust from your indoor air. With app control, you can monitor air quality and adjust settings from anywhere.

name: Wi-Fi 6 Router
shortDescription: Next-gen speed and coverage for your home.
detailsDescription: Upgrade your network with the Wi-Fi 6 Router. It offers faster speeds, reduced latency, and a wider coverage area, allowing multiple devices to connect seamlessly without lag.

name: Laptop Backpack
shortDescription: Stylish and secure way to carry your laptop.
detailsDescription: This laptop backpack is designed for both style and functionality. It features a padded compartment for your laptop, multiple pockets for accessories, and an anti-theft design.

name: Bluetooth Keyboard
shortDescription: A sleek, full-sized keyboard for multi-device use.
detailsDescription: This Bluetooth keyboard provides a comfortable typing experience with its full-sized layout and quiet keys. Easily switch between multiple devices with the press of a button.

name: Smart Doorbell
shortDescription: See and speak to visitors from anywhere.
detailsDescription: The Smart Doorbell lets you know who is at your door, even when you're not home. With HD video, two-way audio, and motion detection, you can monitor your front door from your smartphone.
